name: everforest-pro
description: A warm, soft-contrast color scheme for Visual Studio Code
author: Andrei Lucaci (https://andreilucaci.ro)

everforestPro.theme.darkContrast.title: Dark Contrast
everforestPro.theme.darkContrast.description: Background contrast for the dark variant.

everforestPro.theme.lightContrast.title: Light Contrast
everforestPro.theme.lightContrast.description: Background contrast for the light variant.

everforestPro.theme.darkWorkbench.title: Dark Workbench
everforestPro.theme.darkWorkbench.description: Workbench style for the dark variant.

everforestPro.theme.lightWorkbench.title: Light Workbench
everforestPro.theme.lightWorkbench.description: Workbench style for the light variant.

everforestPro.theme.darkCursor.title: Dark Cursor
everforestPro.theme.darkCursor.description: The cursor color in the dark variant.

everforestPro.theme.lightCursor.title: Light Cursor
everforestPro.theme.lightCursor.description: The cursor color in the light variant.

everforestPro.theme.darkSelection.title: Dark Selection
everforestPro.theme.darkSelection.description: The background color of selected text in the dark variant.

everforestPro.theme.lightSelection.title: Light Selection
everforestPro.theme.lightSelection.description: The background color of selected text in the light variant.

everforestPro.theme.diagnosticTextBackgr.title: Diagnostic Text Background Opacity
everforestPro.theme.diagnosticTextBackgr.markdownDescription: The opacity of the background color of [diagnostic text](https://code.visualstudio.com/updates/v1_52#_error-background-colors).

everforestPro.theme.highContrast.title: High Contrast
everforestPro.theme.highContrast.description: Whether to add an additional border around items across the UI to increase the contrast.

everforestPro.autoSwitch.enabled.title: Enabled
everforestPro.autoSwitch.enabled.description: Automatically switch between light and dark themes based on time schedule.

everforestPro.autoSwitch.lightThemeTime.title: Light Theme Time
everforestPro.autoSwitch.lightThemeTime.description: Time to switch to light theme (24-hour format, e.g., '07:00').

everforestPro.autoSwitch.darkThemeTime.title: Dark Theme Time
everforestPro.autoSwitch.darkThemeTime.description: Time to switch to dark theme (24-hour format, e.g., '19:00').

scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run compile:ts && npm run compile:themes
